title: Talking about kitchens
creator_credit: Gerard Holdsworth Productions and Gerry Poulson
brief_description: Gilbert Harding explains how thought and planning, both in the new kitchen and when renovating an old one, can result in more convenient arrangement of benches, stove, dish-washing machine and sink, making work easier and less tiring. Shows how the basic principles of planning can be applied to a great variety of circumstances.
